nodes.name: Sticky Note1

parameters.content:
## Set Globals
Define the `download_limit` of how many songs should be kept in the Downloads playlist.
*This setup currently supports a maximum of 50.*

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note2

parameters.content:
## Setup Trigger
Define the update interval. By default the playlist gets updated ones a day.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note

parameters.content:
## Information
This workflow automatically creates a playlist in Spotify named "Downloads". It keeps a list of a defined amount of the latest liked songs up to date.

This enables only the Downloads playlist to set for automatic downloading and thus free up space on the device.

**Beware that it can take several minutes until a newly created Spotify developer app is fully functioning.**

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note3

parameters.content: Get the "Downloads" playlist by name. Create it, if it does not exist.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note4

parameters.content: Get all latest liked songs and check whether they already exist in the Downloads playlist.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note5

parameters.content: Add new tracks to the Downloads playlist. Remove tracks if they exceed the defined limit.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Globals

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# If Workflow

## Overview
Automated workflow: If Workflow. This workflow integrates 10 different services: filter, stickyNote, code, scheduleTrigger, splitOut. It contains 23 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 23
- **Node Types**: 10
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **If no playlist**: if
- **Create Downloads Playlist**: spotify
- **Get Liked Tracks**: spotify
- **Loop Over Items**: splitInBatches
- **Aggregate**: aggregate
- **Split Out**: splitOut
- **Add tracks to Downloads**: spotify
- **Get Downloads Playlist**: spotify
- **Filter out new tracks**: code
- **Get tracks to remove**: code
- ... and 13 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
